languages.text: "Культы смерти, возникшие благодаря заступничеству Кровавой паутины, почуяли неладное и отправили к Неумирающему немало прихожан, лишив еретиков части новобранцев".
languages.translation_comment: Тут нужен этюд на выбор Кибеллы из Dargonus_Part_4
Тут нужен этюд на выбор Кибеллы из Dargonus_Part_4

languages.text: "The death cults that had sprung up through the intercession of the Bloodspun Web had gotten wind of the trouble and sent quite a few misguided parishioners to the Undying One, depriving the heretics of some recruits."
languages.original_text: "Культы смерти, возникшие благодаря заступничеству Кровавой паутины, почуяли неладное и отправили к Неумирающему немало прихожан, лишив еретиков части новобранцев".

traits.locale_text: "The death cults that had sprung up through the intercession of the Bloodspun Web had gotten wind of the trouble and sent quite a few members to the Undying One, depriving the heretics of some recruits."

"The death cults that had sprung up through the intercession of the Bloodspun Web had gotten wind of the trouble and sent quite a few members to the Undying One, depriving the heretics of some recruits."

"The death cults that had sprung up through the intercession of the Bloodspun Web had gotten wind of the trouble and sent quite a few misguided parishioners to the Undying One, depriving the heretics of some recruits."

languages.text: "Die Todeskulte, die durch die Fürsprache des Blutgesponnenen Netzes entstanden waren, hatten von den Problemen erfahren und einige fehlgeleitete Gemeindemitglieder zum Todlosen geschickt, um die Ketzer einiger Rekruten zu berauben."
languages.original_text: "The death cults that had sprung up through the intercession of the Bloodspun Web had gotten wind of the trouble and sent quite a few misguided parishioners to the Undying One, depriving the heretics of some recruits."

traits.locale_text: "Die Todeskulte, die durch die Fürsprache des Blutgesponnenen Netzes entstanden waren, hatten von den Problemen erfahren und einige fehlgeleitete Gemeindemitglieder zum Todlosen geschickt, um die Ketzer einiger Rekruten zu berauben."

languages.text: « Les cultes de la mort nés de l'intercession de la Toile de Sang ont eu vent des troubles et ont envoyé plus d'une brebis égarée rejoindre l'Immortel, privant ainsi les hérétiques d'un certain nombre de recrues. »
languages.original_text: "The death cults that had sprung up through the intercession of the Bloodspun Web had gotten wind of the trouble and sent quite a few misguided parishioners to the Undying One, depriving the heretics of some recruits."

traits.locale_text: « Les cultes de la mort nés de l'intercession de la Toile de Sang ont eu vent des troubles et ont envoyé plus d'une brebis égarée rejoindre l'Immortel, privant ainsi les hérétiques d'un certain nombre de recrues. »

languages.text: «Los cultos de la Muerte que habían aparecido mediante la intercesión de la Red Sanguinolenta se enteraron del problema y enviaron a unos cuantos feligreses descarriados al encuentro del Inmortal, reduciendo las filas de los herejes».
languages.original_text: "The death cults that had sprung up through the intercession of the Bloodspun Web had gotten wind of the trouble and sent quite a few misguided parishioners to the Undying One, depriving the heretics of some recruits."

traits.locale_text: «Los cultos de la Muerte que habían aparecido mediante la intercesión de la Red Sanguinolenta se enteraron del problema y enviaron a unos cuantos feligreses descarriados al encuentro del Inmortal, reduciendo las filas de los herejes».

languages.text: 「ブラッドスパン・ウェブの介入により生まれた死のカルトはトラブルを嗅ぎつけ、かなりの数の邪教の京都を不死の者の下へと送り込み、異端者たちの新兵を奪っていった」
languages.original_text: "The death cults that had sprung up through the intercession of the Bloodspun Web had gotten wind of the trouble and sent quite a few misguided parishioners to the Undying One, depriving the heretics of some recruits."

traits.locale_text: 「ブラッドスパン・ウェブの介入により生まれた死のカルトはトラブルを嗅ぎつけ、かなりの数の邪教の京都を不死の者の下へと送り込み、異端者たちの新兵を奪っていった」

languages.text: “在织血罗网的指引下，许多死亡教派感受到了邪恶的风声。他们将许许多多误入歧途的居民送到了不死之神手中，消灭了异端分子的一部分新生力量。”
languages.original_text: "The death cults that had sprung up through the intercession of the Bloodspun Web had gotten wind of the trouble and sent quite a few misguided parishioners to the Undying One, depriving the heretics of some recruits."

traits.locale_text: “在织血罗网的指引下，许多死亡教派感受到了邪恶的风声。他们将许许多多误入歧途的居民送到了不死之神手中，消灭了异端分子的一部分新生力量。”

languages.text: "Kanipi Ağı'nın şefaati sayesinde ortaya çıkan ölüm tarikatları, belanın kokusunu almış ve yoldan sapmış birkaç cemaat üyelerini Ölmeyen'e kavuşturarak kâfirleri saflarına katabilecekleri acemilerden yoksun bırakmış."
languages.original_text: "The death cults that had sprung up through the intercession of the Bloodspun Web had gotten wind of the trouble and sent quite a few misguided parishioners to the Undying One, depriving the heretics of some recruits."
